articles.title: Improve Earplug Efficiency To Preserve Workers’ Hearing Health: Study - LatestLY
articles.description: Earplugs must not only fit properly inside the ear canal but must also exert pressure against the walls of the canal in order to make a tight seal. However, if the plugs put too much pressure on the ear canal walls, they will cause the wearer pain.
